changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS user_base; CREATE TABLE user_base ( login_name varchar(15) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, password varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, user_number varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, id varchar(18) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, user_name varchar(8) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, sex char(1) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'M', delete_flg char(1) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', user_status char(1) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', create_time varchar(15) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, update_time varchar(15) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, pk char(22) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (login_name,pk), UNIQUE KEY login_name_UNIQUE (login_name) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin COMMENT='内部员工表基本信息表';
create table user_base

changeSet.author: simpletiny
changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS user_info; CREATE TABLE user_info ( id varchar(18) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, id_file_name varchar(45) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, user_right varchar(45) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, update_time varchar(15) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, create_time varchar(15) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, pk char(22) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, nick_name varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, cellphone varchar(11) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id,pk), UNIQUE KEY staff_number_UNIQUE (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin COMMENT='内部员工关联信息表';
create table user_info

changeSet.author: simpletiny
changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS task; CREATE TABLE task ( executor INT NOT NULL , method VARCHAR(45) NULL , parameters VARCHAR(45) NULL , taskType VARCHAR(45) NULL , executeTime TIMESTAMP NULL , isdone CHAR(1) NULL , create_time VARCHAR(15) NULL , update_time VARCHAR(15) NULL , pk VARCHAR(45) NULL , new_tablecol VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (new_tablecol) ) DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_bin;
create table task

changeSet.author: simpletiny
changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS client; CREATE TABLE client ( client_name varchar(30) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, client_short_name varchar(30) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, client_area varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, client_type varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, telephone varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, fax varchar(15) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, address varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, body_name varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, body_sex varchar(45) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, body_id varchar(18) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, body_birth_year varchar(4) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, body_wechat varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, body_cellphone varchar(11) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, create_user varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, create_time varchar(15) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, update_user varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, update_time varchar(15) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, approve_user varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, update_reason varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, comment varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, pk char(22) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (pk) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin COMMENT='客户表';
create table client
